ygData.subject: Re: New Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is on a normal server. Guess I will /bug it tomorrow when I log in. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT d-
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Jun 30/99, John Kim <kim@...> wrote:
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 30 Jun 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
> >
> > On the Dirge, it will also damage you as well as the monsters it's
> > targetting, so watch it if you attempt to actually use it if you are
> > desperate and low on health. It took about a RL hour to fully regain my
> > mana after using the song.
>
> Is this on the PvP server or the regular servers? I don't
> know of any area effect spell/song that also damages you.
> Perhaps it should be /bugged?

This is on a normal server. Guess I will /bug it tomorrow when I log in.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
